text: For diabetic-friendly diets, prioritize low glycemic index foods, high fiber, lean proteins, and avoid added sugars.
High blood pressure management benefits from reduced sodium (<1500 mg/day), increased potassium from fruits/vegetables, and limited processed foods.
For weight loss, aim for a modest calorie deficit, prioritize protein intake (1.6-2.2 g/kg), and choose high-satiety foods.
